title: No tracking cookies and web analytics opt-out

tosdr.tldr: Cookies are only used in so far as they are required for the technical working of the system, and we never use them to track you on third party sites. The site also uses web analytics, but you can opt-out at https://mykolab.com/privacy

topics.description: Cookies are files stored locally in your web browser containing identifiable information.
